articles.description: Vivo V29e (Price: Rs 26,999)- This phone comes with a 64-megapixel sensor on the back with OIS and the 8-megapixel ultrawide camera. It also has a massive 50-megapixel selfie camera which comes with autofocus and eye autofocus. It has a 5,000mAh battery suppo…
